con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def response=messageExchange.response.responseContent def json1=new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def token=json1.data.access_token log.info token context.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue('token',token)
